title: Beef and booze casserole
ingredients: ['2 (500g) packs of braising steak', '2 tablespoons vegetable or olive oil', '3 large onions, sliced', '1 250g punnet mushrooms, sliced', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon snipped fresh rosemary or marjoram', '1/2 teaspoon snipped fresh thyme', '1/2 teaspoon snipped fresh parsley', '1 bay leaf', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '125ml beef stock', '225ml red wine', '2 tablespoons brandy']
